REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0681 reute r f BC-DISNEY-<DIS>-OPENING 03-25 0058

TEXT.TITLE: DISNEY <DIS> OPENING EXPERIMENTAL RETAIL OUTLET
TEXT.BODY: Walt Disney Co said it will open its first non-tourist retail operation on March 28 at the Galleria shopping mall in Glendale, Calif. The company said the 2,400 square foot store will test consumer response to a retail outlet featuring all Disney character merchandise. Reuter
